title: Pizza Hut
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu offers 2 vegetarian pizzas, can be ordered without cheese. Or create your own. Bases are vegan including pan, thin crust, and gluten free. With your pizza order you get a salad bowl to the salad bar.
